title: Suggestions for 'squarish' serif typefaces
content:
_I know, I know, normally I am the one suggesting typefaces and alternates but, hey, why not try. ;)_

I am currently looking, or better desperately searching, for ’squarish’ serif typefaces. (Keywords/Tagclouds: ’Superellipse’, ’Lamé Curve’, ’Eurostile Serif’ ;)

_(And, of course, I am thankful for every single suggestion / hint.)_

Thank you,  
Dav

 [‹ San-Serif for religion or faith based content?](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34064 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pixel font for print...Fedra? / Lo-res? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34524 "Go to next forum topic")
author: formlos

comments.content:
Hmm, looks like the Edit button is missing on this new version of Typophile.

[Edison](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/edison_virtual/)  
 [Marconi](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/marconi_virtual/)

[FF Signa Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=signa%20serif)  
 [Jasper](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/jasper)  
 [Maximus](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/maximus_virtual/) - Man this thing is ugly. How did Tracy write the preeminent book of type critique?

Maximus: you’re ignoring what _size_ it was meant to be used at...  
Just like his Adsans; it’s not “pretty” - it’s brilliant.

hhp
I need to see it in print then.

Try  
 [Vahika](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/vahika/) by Ray Larabie.  
 [Midnight Kernboy](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/midnight-kernboy/) (semi-serif by Sentinel)  
 [Bodonitown](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/klein03/text/bodonitown.htm) by Manfred Klein.  
and [Plumbers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/plumbersgothic.html) by Harold Lohner with a more _extravagant_ look.

Schönes Wochenende …

Melior is made from the Superellipse (superellipsis) formula/shape by Piet Hein [http://www.2dcurves.com/power/powerse.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.2dcurves.com/power/powerse.html "http://www.2dcurves.com/power/powerse.html")

Thank you all, a lot, for these fine suggestions, so far.  
Yea, Stephen, I guess slabs would count as well.

Thanks,  
Dav

Note: Piet Hein is not the originator of the Superellipse idea.

Other options: Scherzo (Albert Boton), Franklin-Antiqua or Vergil (Berthold).

<cite>Note: Piet Hein is not the originator of the Superellipse idea.</cite>

Indeed not, read my previous link for more info on that.
domdib - why are all your links formatted like wiki links? I think you might be adding brackets unnecessarily.

Zapf Elliptical 711 yes, definitely.

Also, if you’ll consider a condensed design at all, [Euphonia](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/euphonia/) comes in Latin form (Euphonia Latin) as well as slab form (Euphonia Roman).

Midnight Kernboy is a bit unconventional in structure and rigid in appearance for general text use, but its short slabs help make it readable and I appreciate the suggestion :^)

j a m e s

@Stephen Coles

Yes, sorry, the correct formatting wasn’t clear to me. I needed to read “More information...”

\> Yea, Stephen, I guess slabs would count as well.

[Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Dispatch)  
 [Cholla Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/emigre/cholla_slab/)  
 [Raleigh](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/raleigh_virtual/)  
 [Aquarius](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/red_rooster/aquarius/)  
 [Equestrienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Equestrienne)  
 [Remontoire](http://web.archive.org/web/20070825115635/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/psyops/remontoire_set_ot/)
Don’t forget Trump’s Schadow Antiqua series
